actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Siskiyou National Forest, Oreg., for addition to the Kalmiopsis Wilderness, to designate certain additional lands for wilderness study.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Siskiyou National Forest, Oregon, for addition to the Kalmiopsis Wilderness. Designates specified additional lands in such Forest for study for possible inclusion in such wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Siskiyou National Forest, Oreg., for addition to the Kalmiopsis Wilderness, to designate certain additional lands for wilderness study.
